PAGE 4: Documentation: i am a lover of poetry! and since poetry is so much about playing with language, code is such an excellent format.

i reread all the revolutionary letters and some of my favorite Ada Limón poems and used that as inspiration for this poem. di Prima's work is so great at making the political poetic and Limón has such a nuanced grasp of grief and love.
this was a meditation on the personal, the political, and the ghosts which occupy so much of my thinking these days.
ghost to mean many things. ghost to mean metaphor. ghost to mean responsibility. ghost to mean grief.
the comma has a starring role, as is fit for its ubiquitous yet understated role in written work and coding structure, and its representation of continuity.
